```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
library(tidyverse)

base_dir <- here::here("")
db_file <- fs::path(base_dir, "SAMPLEDB")
if(dbCanConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), db_file)) {
    sampledb <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), db_file)
}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    connection = "sampledb", # automatically uses this connection in sql chunks 
    comment = "#>", 
    collapse = TRUE, 
    message = FALSE,
    fig.width = 8,
    fig.asp = ((1 + sqrt(5)) / 2) - 1, # the golden ratio - technically, the b proportion of a+b when a is 1
    out.width = "70%",
    fig.align = "center"
)
```
